title: The Vampire Bat (1933, Horror) Lionel Atwill, Fay Wray | Full Movie

sources.title: The Vampire Bat (1933, Horror) Lionel Atwill, Fay Wray | Full Movie
sources.description:
These are the TALONS of The Vampire Bat
A German village is stricken by a series of murders that appear to be the work of vampires.

Original title: The Vampire Bat (1933) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/IctQwO6YYpQ

Director: Frank R. Strayer 
Writer: Edward T. Lowe Jr. 
Stars: Lionel Atwill, Fay Wray, Melvyn Douglas
Genres: Colorized, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Romance, Sci-Fi


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:46 Investigation into mysterious deaths in a village leads to debates on vampires and bats.
07:32 Mysterious events unfold in a village, with talk of vampires and giant bats causing fear and suspicion.
13:18 Strange murders in a village spark fear of a vampire. Suspicion falls on a man with a peculiar fascination with bats.
20:53 Discussion on potential human vampire existence and suspicion towards Herman in a village.
26:09 Deaths spark vampire suspicions in a town. Doctor investigates while a manhunt for a missing person commences.
31:22 Mysterious events unfold in a village, leading to suspicion of a resident being involved in recent deaths.
43:22 Mystery unfolds in a village as suspicion falls on Herman Gleib for the murders, leading to fear and paranoia.
48:54 Murders in a village lead to suspicions of a vampire, but a detective investigates further to uncover the truth.
57:52 A doctor creates life from tissue, leading to murder and chaos in a small town.
